EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2018-03-22
EmailTemplate.subject: Betting Big on Mobility and Announcing Spring Cloud Data Flow 1.4
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
March 22, 2018 <[[https://pivotal.io/customers/ford?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Betting Big on Mobility How Ford Is transforming itself into the worldâ€™s most trusted mobility company. Driving into the Future <[[https://pivotal.io/customers/ford?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/spring-cloud-data-flow-1-4-ui-ux-refresh-stream-deployment-builder-and-security-improvements?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Announcing Spring Cloud Data Flow 1.4 Spring Cloud Data Flow 1.4 is now GA! Check out the latest release highlights. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/spring-cloud-data-flow-1-4-ui-ux-refresh-stream-deployment-builder-and-security-improvements?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/a-day-in-the-life-of-a-pivotal-engineer-b83558737910?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> A Day in the Life of a Pivotal Engineer Bebe Peng, Senior Software Engineer, takes you along for a day in her life at Pivotal New York. What it's like to work at Pivotal <[[https://builttoadapt.io/a-day-in-the-life-of-a-pivotal-engineer-b83558737910?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[http://greenplumsummit.io/?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/not-another-augmented-reality-how-to-23a3900206cf?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Not Another Augmented Reality How-To Caleb Garling weighs the considerations of applying AR to a fictional application. Check it Out <[[https://builttoadapt.io/not-another-augmented-reality-how-to-23a3900206cf?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-blog/postgresql-for-kubernetes-quickstart-for-pks?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> PostgreSQL for Kubernetes Quickstart for PKS Learn why Crunchy Data created a tool to help manage your containerized PostgreSQL environment on PKS and how you can get the operator setup in your PKS environment with this post from Jonathan Katz. Read More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-blog/postgresql-for-kubernetes-quickstart-for-pks?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/good-pair-bad-pair-9ff3138bf4d4?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Good Pair, Bad Pair What makes a good pair? Llama Explain Something to You <[[https://builttoadapt.io/good-pair-bad-pair-9ff3138bf4d4?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/how-to-cut-the-waste-from-your-software-development-process-ep-63?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> How to Cut the Waste from Your Software Development Process (Ep. 63) In this episode of Pivotal Insights, Matt Gunter, Senior Technologist and Customer Advocate at Pivotal, explains how value stream mapping helps developers find and cut the hidden areas of waste in their development process. Listen Now <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/how-to-cut-the-waste-from-your-software-development-process-ep-63?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 3/29 Implementation Aspects with Java and Spring (Boot, Data & Cloud) Part Five, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/mar-29-implementation-aspects-with-java-and-spring-boot-data-cloud-part-five-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
